head.title: C Preprocessor
head.intro: Quick reference for the [C macro preprocessor](https://en.m.wikipedia.org/wiki/C_preprocessor), which can be used independent of C/C++.

body.title: Token concat
body.elms:
```
#define DST(name) name##_s name##_t
DST(object);   #=> object_s object_t;
```

body.title: Stringification
body.elms:
```
#define STR(name) #name
char * a = STR(object);   #=> char * a = "object";
```
